It's the only one that remains safe even though it's surrounded by the demon army?"},{"lineNumber":255656,"originalJapaneseLine":"リッチですね、開戦初期、すぐに周囲は魔軍に制圧され、さらに都市防衛隊も","translatedEnglishLine":"That's Ritch. At the beginning of the war, the surrounding areas were quickly taken over by the demon army, and the city defense forces as well..."},{"lineNumber":255657,"originalJapaneseLine":"ほとんど壊滅したはずなのですが、何故か無事な状態","translatedEnglishLine":"They should have been almost annihilated, but for some reason, the city remains intact."},{"lineNumber":255658,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍と何か取り引きでもあるのではと・・調べている所です","translatedEnglishLine":"We're investigating whether there is some kind of deal with the demon selection/movement."},{"lineNumber":255661,"originalJapaneseLine":"よし、では、リッチに向かうぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"Alright, then, let's head to 31."},{"lineNumber":255663,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物軍の勢力圏を突破だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"We will break through the demon army's territory."},{"lineNumber":255664,"originalJapaneseLine":"道中","translatedEnglishLine":"On the way."},{"lineNumber":255665,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達はリッチに向かって進んでいる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance them."},{"lineNumber":255667,"originalJapaneseLine":"よくあんな噂を信じて行動を起こしましたね。","translatedEnglishLine":"You really acted on that kind of rumor, huh?"},{"lineNumber":255668,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":255669,"originalJapaneseLine":"回想","translatedEnglishLine":"Flashback."},{"lineNumber":255670,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リッチ、リーザスでも裕福な層が多数住んでいる高級都市","translatedEnglishLine":"Ritch, a wealthy city where many affluent people in Leesas live."},{"lineNumber":255671,"originalJapaneseLine":"　こっそり半年一度行われていたガールズショーが、こんな状況でも継続されている","translatedEnglishLine":"The girls' show, secretly held once every six months, is continuing even in these circumstances."},{"lineNumber":255672,"originalJapaneseLine":"　というか、毎月行われている。","translatedEnglishLine":"Or rather, it’s held every month."},{"lineNumber":255673,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ガールズショーとは・・、（ワールドノート、ガールズショーの設定を確認）","translatedEnglishLine":"What is a girls' show... (Checking the world note for girls' show settings.)"},{"lineNumber":255674,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんと、そんなすごいショーがあったのか知らなかった、俺とした事が・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Wow, I didn't know there was such an amazing show, what was I thinking..."},{"lineNumber":255675,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうやら、魔軍の上層部がエロ好きでガールズショーを見る為にリッチの安全を保証しているのとか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Apparently, the high command of the demon army likes erotic things and guarantees Ritch’s safety to watch the girls' show..."},{"lineNumber":255676,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そんな噂も流れているわ、さすがに有り得ないので真偽を確かめている所です","translatedEnglishLine":"Such rumors are also circulating, but since it's unlikely, we are verifying the truth."},{"lineNumber":255677,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":255678,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺は事実だと思うな、魔物連中はそろいもそろってエロいからな。","translatedEnglishLine":"I think it’s true; all those monsters are pretty perverted."},{"lineNumber":255679,"originalJapaneseLine":"それならリッチに手を出さないのも納得出来る","translatedEnglishLine":"If that's the case, it makes sense why they leave Ritch alone."},{"lineNumber":255680,"originalJapaneseLine":"いやいや、ランスじゃあるまいし","translatedEnglishLine":"No, no, not everyone is like Lance."},{"lineNumber":255681,"originalJapaneseLine":"ま、ともかく行ってみよう","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, anyway, let's go and see."},{"lineNumber":255682,"originalJapaneseLine":"大都市オクに到着した","translatedEnglishLine":"Arrived at the large city Oku."},{"lineNumber":255683,"originalJapaneseLine":"ＪＡＰＡＮから派遣された部隊、南国軍が配備されている","translatedEnglishLine":"A unit dispatched from JAPAN, the Southern Army, is stationed here."},{"lineNumber":255684,"originalJapaneseLine":"アギレダがいます、でも、あまりランスとは話をしてくれない","translatedEnglishLine":"Agireda is here, but she doesn't talk much with Lance."},{"lineNumber":255685,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人はもういない、いずれ反撃作戦が開始される、その準備で忙しい","translatedEnglishLine":"There are no demons anymore. The counterattack operation will start eventually, and they're busy preparing for it."},{"lineNumber":255686,"originalJapaneseLine":"この辺りはリーザスの穀倉地帯","translatedEnglishLine":"This area is the breadbasket of Leesas."},{"lineNumber":255687,"originalJapaneseLine":"大規模な農園がいっぱいあります。","translatedEnglishLine":"There are many large-scale farms."},{"lineNumber":255688,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍の支配地ですが、幸いこの時期はレタスが繁っているので","translatedEnglishLine":"Though it is under demon army control, fortunately, lettuce is thriving at this time of year,"},{"lineNumber":255689,"originalJapaneseLine":"ある程度の規模で動いても見つかりにくいです。","translatedEnglishLine":"so it's hard to be spotted even moving on a moderate scale."},{"lineNumber":255690,"originalJapaneseLine":"このままレタス畑に隠れて進みましょう。","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's continue hiding in the lettuce fields as we proceed."},{"lineNumber":255691,"originalJapaneseLine":"かなみ、リーザスの連絡員と接触。情報を受け取る","translatedEnglishLine":"Kanami makes contact with a Leesas informant and receives information."},{"lineNumber":255692,"originalJapaneseLine":"リッチの事を調べてもらっていたの、ガールズショーの話だけで事実だったみたい。びっくり","translatedEnglishLine":"They investigated Ritch, and it seems the girls' show story was true. Surprising."},{"lineNumber":255693,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物側の命令でガールズショーを開いている","translatedEnglishLine":"The girls' show is held by order of the demons."},{"lineNumber":255694,"originalJapaneseLine":"　観客は全て魔物、人間達の女の子の恥ずかしいショーを楽しんでいるらしい","translatedEnglishLine":"All the audience are demons, apparently enjoying the embarrassing shows of human girls."},{"lineNumber":255695,"originalJapaneseLine":"　特に敵の司令官、大将軍ヨシフがすごい好きらしい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Especially, the enemy commander, Generalissimo Yoshif, seems to love it very much."},{"lineNumber":255696,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんでも、毎回ショーの優勝者を自分の屋敷に招いて自分の為だけにショーをさせているとか","translatedEnglishLine":"He apparently invites the show's winner to his mansion every time and makes her perform solely for him."},{"lineNumber":255697,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その見返りとして、包囲はするがリッチの安全は保証しているとの事だわ","translatedEnglishLine":"In return, although the city is besieged, Ritch’s safety is guaranteed."},{"lineNumber":255698,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふむふむ、なるほど・・やはり、いかねばなるまい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, I see... We definitely have to go."},{"lineNumber":255699,"originalJapaneseLine":"エロ将軍ヨシフをぶっ殺して、女の子達を救わねば","translatedEnglishLine":"We must kill the perverted General Yoshif and save the girls."},{"lineNumber":255700,"originalJapaneseLine":"道中","translatedEnglishLine":"On the road."},{"lineNumber":255701,"originalJapaneseLine":"そういや、レイラさんとリック、なんか仲良かったな","translatedEnglishLine":"By the way, Layla and Rick seemed pretty close."},{"lineNumber":255702,"originalJapaneseLine":"知らないの、レイラ　リックと婚約したのよ","translatedEnglishLine":"Didn't you know? Layla got engaged to Rick."},{"lineNumber":255703,"originalJapaneseLine":"この戦いが終わったら結婚するって","translatedEnglishLine":"They’re going to get married after this war ends."},{"lineNumber":255704,"originalJapaneseLine":"親衛隊もやめる、チルディが次の親衛隊長に決まっている","translatedEnglishLine":"She’s quitting the bodyguards, and Chirdy has been chosen as the next captain."},{"lineNumber":255705,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんだと・・","translatedEnglishLine":"What the...?"},{"lineNumber":255706,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞選択","translatedEnglishLine":"> Selection."},{"lineNumber":255707,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞　リーザス城に戻る","translatedEnglishLine":"> Return to Leesas Castle."},{"lineNumber":255708,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞　この事は後で考えよう","translatedEnglishLine":"> Let's think about this matter later."},{"lineNumber":255709,"originalJapaneseLine":"選択　＞リーザス城に戻る　を選んだ直後","translatedEnglishLine":"Immediately after selecting > Return to Leesas Castle."},{"lineNumber":255710,"originalJapaneseLine":"チルディが止めるが聞かない","translatedEnglishLine":"Chirdy tries to stop him, but he doesn't listen."},{"lineNumber":255711,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはすたすたと元来た道を戻りだした","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance briskly started to return the way he came."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後は自分達でなんとかしないという気持ちのリーザス司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Leesas Command has the feeling that we have to manage things ourselves from here on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦地図を見ながらランスが聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance asks while looking at the tactical map.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういや、この都市はなんだ。ここだけ魔軍に包囲されても無事なんだな？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, what is this city? It's the only one that remains safe even though it's surrounded by the demon army?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リッチですね、開戦初期、すぐに周囲は魔軍に制圧され、さらに都市防衛隊も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's Ritch. At the beginning of the war, the surrounding areas were quickly taken over by the demon army, and the city defense forces as well...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほとんど壊滅したはずなのですが、何故か無事な状態
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They should have been almost annihilated, but for some reason, the city remains intact.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍と何か取り引きでもあるのではと・・調べている所です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We're investigating whether there is some kind of deal with the demon army...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひとつ気になる噂がありまして・・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is one rumor that’s been bothering me...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 選択／移動の後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After selection/movement.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、では、リッチに向かうぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, then, let's head to Ritch.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地図：リーザス１／移動３１
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Map: Leesas 1 / Movement 31.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物軍の勢力圏を突破だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We will break through the demon army's territory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 道中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達はリッチに向かって進んでいる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others are advancing toward Ritch.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チルディは同行しています
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chirdy is accompanying them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よくあんな噂を信じて行動を起こしましたね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You really acted on that kind of rumor, huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 回想
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Flashback.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リッチ、リーザスでも裕福な層が多数住んでいる高級都市
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ritch, a wealthy city where many affluent people in Leesas live.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こっそり半年一度行われていたガールズショーが、こんな状況でも継続されている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The girls' show, secretly held once every six months, is continuing even in these circumstances.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: というか、毎月行われている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or rather, it’s held every month.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガールズショーとは・・、（ワールドノート、ガールズショーの設定を確認）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What is a girls' show... (Checking the world note for girls' show settings.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんと、そんなすごいショーがあったのか知らなかった、俺とした事が・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wow, I didn't know there was such an amazing show, what was I thinking...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやら、魔軍の上層部がエロ好きでガールズショーを見る為にリッチの安全を保証しているのとか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently, the high command of the demon army likes erotic things and guarantees Ritch’s safety to watch the girls' show...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな噂も流れているわ、さすがに有り得ないので真偽を確かめている所です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Such rumors are also circulating, but since it's unlikely, we are verifying the truth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺は事実だと思うな、魔物連中はそろいもそろってエロいからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think it’s true; all those monsters are pretty perverted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それならリッチに手を出さないのも納得出来る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If that's the case, it makes sense why they leave Ritch alone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いやいや、ランスじゃあるまいし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, no, not everyone is like Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、ともかく行ってみよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, anyway, let's go and see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大都市オクに到着した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at the large city Oku.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮから派遣された部隊、南国軍が配備されている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A unit dispatched from JAPAN, the Southern Army, is stationed here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アギレダがいます、でも、あまりランスとは話をしてくれない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Agireda is here, but she doesn't talk much with Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人はもういない、いずれ反撃作戦が開始される、その準備で忙しい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are no demons anymore. The counterattack operation will start eventually, and they're busy preparing for it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この辺りはリーザスの穀倉地帯
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This area is the breadbasket of Leesas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大規模な農園がいっぱいあります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are many large-scale farms.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の支配地ですが、幸いこの時期はレタスが繁っているので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though it is under demon army control, fortunately, lettuce is thriving at this time of year,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ある程度の規模で動いても見つかりにくいです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so it's hard to be spotted even moving on a moderate scale.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このままレタス畑に隠れて進みましょう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's continue hiding in the lettuce fields as we proceed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなみ、リーザスの連絡員と接触。情報を受け取る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami makes contact with a Leesas informant and receives information.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リッチの事を調べてもらっていたの、ガールズショーの話だけで事実だったみたい。びっくり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They investigated Ritch, and it seems the girls' show story was true. Surprising.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物側の命令でガールズショーを開いている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The girls' show is held by order of the demons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 観客は全て魔物、人間達の女の子の恥ずかしいショーを楽しんでいるらしい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: All the audience are demons, apparently enjoying the embarrassing shows of human girls.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 特に敵の司令官、大将軍ヨシフがすごい好きらしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Especially, the enemy commander, Generalissimo Yoshif, seems to love it very much.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんでも、毎回ショーの優勝者を自分の屋敷に招いて自分の為だけにショーをさせているとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He apparently invites the show's winner to his mansion every time and makes her perform solely for him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その見返りとして、包囲はするがリッチの安全は保証しているとの事だわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In return, although the city is besieged, Ritch’s safety is guaranteed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふむふむ、なるほど・・やはり、いかねばなるまい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, I see... We definitely have to go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エロ将軍ヨシフをぶっ殺して、女の子達を救わねば
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We must kill the perverted General Yoshif and save the girls.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 道中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the road.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういや、レイラさんとリック、なんか仲良かったな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, Layla and Rick seemed pretty close.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 知らないの、レイラ　リックと婚約したのよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Didn't you know? Layla got engaged to Rick.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この戦いが終わったら結婚するって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They’re going to get married after this war ends.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 親衛隊もやめる、チルディが次の親衛隊長に決まっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She’s quitting the bodyguards, and Chirdy has been chosen as the next captain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What the...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Selection.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　リーザス城に戻る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Return to Leesas Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　この事は後で考えよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Let's think about this matter later.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 選択　＞リーザス城に戻る　を選んだ直後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Immediately after selecting > Return to Leesas Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チルディが止めるが聞かない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chirdy tries to stop him, but he doesn't listen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはすたすたと元来た道を戻りだした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance briskly started to return the way he came.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

The counterattack operation will start eventually, and they're busy preparing for it."},{"lineNumber":255686,"originalJapaneseLine":"この辺りはリーザスの穀倉地帯","translatedEnglishLine":"This area is the breadbasket of Leesas."},{"lineNumber":255687,"originalJapaneseLine":"大規模な農園がいっぱいあります。","translatedEnglishLine":"There are many large-scale farms."},{"lineNumber":255688,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍の支配地ですが、幸いこの時期はレタスが繁っているので","translatedEnglishLine":"Though it is under demon army control, fortunately, lettuce is thriving at this time of year,"},{"lineNumber":255689,"originalJapaneseLine":"ある程度の規模で動いても見つかりにくいです。","translatedEnglishLine":"so it's hard to be spotted even moving on a moderate scale."},{"lineNumber":255690,"originalJapaneseLine":"このままレタス畑に隠れて進みましょう。","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's continue hiding in the lettuce fields as we proceed."},{"lineNumber":255691,"originalJapaneseLine":"かなみ、リーザスの連絡員と接触。情報を受け取る","translatedEnglishLine":"Kanami makes contact with a Leesas informant and receives information."},{"lineNumber":255692,"originalJapaneseLine":"リッチの事を調べてもらっていたの、ガールズショーの話だけで事実だったみたい。びっくり","translatedEnglishLine":"They investigated Ritch, and it seems the girls' show story was true. Surprising."},{"lineNumber":255693,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物側の命令でガールズショーを開いている","translatedEnglishLine":"The girls' show is held by order of the demons."},{"lineNumber":255694,"originalJapaneseLine":"　観客は全て魔物、人間達の女の子の恥ずかしいショーを楽しんでいるらしい","translatedEnglishLine":"All the audience are demons, apparently enjoying the embarrassing shows of human girls."},{"lineNumber":255695,"originalJapaneseLine":"　特に敵の司令官、大将軍ヨシフがすごい好きらしい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Especially, the enemy commander, Generalissimo Yoshif, seems to love it very much."},{"lineNumber":255696,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんでも、毎回ショーの優勝者を自分の屋敷に招いて自分の為だけにショーをさせているとか","translatedEnglishLine":"He apparently invites the show's winner to his mansion every time and makes her perform solely for him."},{"lineNumber":255697,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その見返りとして、包囲はするがリッチの安全は保証しているとの事だわ","translatedEnglishLine":"In return, although the city is besieged, Ritch’s safety is guaranteed."},{"lineNumber":255698,"originalJapaneseLine":"ふむふむ、なるほど・・やはり、いかねばなるまい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, I see... We definitely have to go."},{"lineNumber":255699,"originalJapaneseLine":"エロ将軍ヨシフをぶっ殺して、女の子達を救わねば","translatedEnglishLine":"We must kill the perverted General Yoshif and save the girls."},{"lineNumber":255700,"originalJapaneseLine":"道中","translatedEnglishLine":"On the road."},{"lineNumber":255701,"originalJapaneseLine":"そういや、レイラさんとリック、なんか仲良かったな","translatedEnglishLine":"By the way, Layla and Rick seemed pretty close."},{"lineNumber":255702,"originalJapaneseLine":"知らないの、レイラ　リックと婚約したのよ","translatedEnglishLine":"Didn't you know? translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後は自分達でなんとかしないという気持ちのリーザス司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Leesas Command has the feeling that we have to manage things ourselves from here on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦地図を見ながらランスが聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance asks while looking at the tactical map.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういや、この都市はなんだ。ここだけ魔軍に包囲されても無事なんだな？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, what is this city? It's the only one that remains safe even though it's surrounded by the demon army?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リッチですね、開戦初期、すぐに周囲は魔軍に制圧され、さらに都市防衛隊も
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's Ritch. At the beginning of the war, the surrounding areas were quickly taken over by the demon army, and the city defense forces as well...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほとんど壊滅したはずなのですが、何故か無事な状態
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They should have been almost annihilated, but for some reason, the city remains intact.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍と何か取り引きでもあるのではと・・調べている所です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We're investigating whether there is some kind of deal with the demon army...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひとつ気になる噂がありまして・・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is one rumor that’s been bothering me...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 選択／移動の後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After selection/movement.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、では、リッチに向かうぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, then, let's head to Ritch.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地図：リーザス１／移動３１
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Map: Leesas 1 / Movement 31.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物軍の勢力圏を突破だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We will break through the demon army's territory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 道中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the way.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達はリッチに向かって進んでいる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and the others are advancing toward Ritch.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チルディは同行しています
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chirdy is accompanying them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よくあんな噂を信じて行動を起こしましたね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You really acted on that kind of rumor, huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 回想
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Flashback.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リッチ、リーザスでも裕福な層が多数住んでいる高級都市
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ritch, a wealthy city where many affluent people in Leesas live.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こっそり半年一度行われていたガールズショーが、こんな状況でも継続されている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The girls' show, secretly held once every six months, is continuing even in these circumstances.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: というか、毎月行われている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Or rather, it’s held every month.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ガールズショーとは・・、（ワールドノート、ガールズショーの設定を確認）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What is a girls' show... (Checking the world note for girls' show settings.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんと、そんなすごいショーがあったのか知らなかった、俺とした事が・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wow, I didn't know there was such an amazing show, what was I thinking...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやら、魔軍の上層部がエロ好きでガールズショーを見る為にリッチの安全を保証しているのとか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently, the high command of the demon army likes erotic things and guarantees Ritch’s safety to watch the girls' show...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな噂も流れているわ、さすがに有り得ないので真偽を確かめている所です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Such rumors are also circulating, but since it's unlikely, we are verifying the truth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺は事実だと思うな、魔物連中はそろいもそろってエロいからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think it’s true; all those monsters are pretty perverted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それならリッチに手を出さないのも納得出来る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If that's the case, it makes sense why they leave Ritch alone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いやいや、ランスじゃあるまいし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, no, not everyone is like Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、ともかく行ってみよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, anyway, let's go and see.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大都市オクに到着した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at the large city Oku.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＪＡＰＡＮから派遣された部隊、南国軍が配備されている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A unit dispatched from JAPAN, the Southern Army, is stationed here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アギレダがいます、でも、あまりランスとは話をしてくれない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Agireda is here, but she doesn't talk much with Lance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人はもういない、いずれ反撃作戦が開始される、その準備で忙しい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are no demons anymore. The counterattack operation will start eventually, and they're busy preparing for it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この辺りはリーザスの穀倉地帯
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This area is the breadbasket of Leesas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大規模な農園がいっぱいあります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are many large-scale farms.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の支配地ですが、幸いこの時期はレタスが繁っているので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though it is under demon army control, fortunately, lettuce is thriving at this time of year,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ある程度の規模で動いても見つかりにくいです。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so it's hard to be spotted even moving on a moderate scale.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このままレタス畑に隠れて進みましょう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's continue hiding in the lettuce fields as we proceed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなみ、リーザスの連絡員と接触。情報を受け取る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami makes contact with a Leesas informant and receives information.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リッチの事を調べてもらっていたの、ガールズショーの話だけで事実だったみたい。びっくり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They investigated Ritch, and it seems the girls' show story was true. Surprising.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物側の命令でガールズショーを開いている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The girls' show is held by order of the demons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 観客は全て魔物、人間達の女の子の恥ずかしいショーを楽しんでいるらしい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: All the audience are demons, apparently enjoying the embarrassing shows of human girls.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 特に敵の司令官、大将軍ヨシフがすごい好きらしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Especially, the enemy commander, Generalissimo Yoshif, seems to love it very much.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんでも、毎回ショーの優勝者を自分の屋敷に招いて自分の為だけにショーをさせているとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He apparently invites the show's winner to his mansion every time and makes her perform solely for him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その見返りとして、包囲はするがリッチの安全は保証しているとの事だわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In return, although the city is besieged, Ritch’s safety is guaranteed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふむふむ、なるほど・・やはり、いかねばなるまい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, I see... We definitely have to go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エロ将軍ヨシフをぶっ殺して、女の子達を救わねば
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We must kill the perverted General Yoshif and save the girls.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 道中
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the road.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういや、レイラさんとリック、なんか仲良かったな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, Layla and Rick seemed pretty close.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 知らないの、レイラ　リックと婚約したのよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Didn't you know? Layla got engaged to Rick.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この戦いが終わったら結婚するって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They’re going to get married after this war ends.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 親衛隊もやめる、チルディが次の親衛隊長に決まっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She’s quitting the bodyguards, and Chirdy has been chosen as the next captain.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんだと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What the...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Selection.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　リーザス城に戻る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Return to Leesas Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　この事は後で考えよう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Let's think about this matter later.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 選択　＞リーザス城に戻る　を選んだ直後
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Immediately after selecting > Return to Leesas Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: チルディが止めるが聞かない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chirdy tries to stop him, but he doesn't listen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスはすたすたと元来た道を戻りだした
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance briskly started to return the way he came.
